item.title: Crypto Markets Drift Into Year-End With Bitcoin, Ethereum Range-Bound
item.description: Spot Bitcoin and Ethereum ETFs reversed recent outflows, but price action remained muted.

item.title: Bitwise, Grayscale, Trump Media Lead Wall Street’s Year-End ETF Frenzy
item.description: Bitwise filed 11 crypto ETF proposals on Tuesday covering DeFi, AI-linked, and emerging blockchain assets.

item.title: 'Big Short' Investor Michael Burry Says He Is Not Short Tesla Even As He Calls The Stock ‘Ridiculously Overvalued’
item.description: The investor and hedge fund manager clarified in an X post reply that he is not short Tesla shares.

item.title: Robinhood’s Q4 Revenue Outlook Turns Cautious As Barclays Points To Crypto Weakness
item.description: Barclays said December metrics showed mixed trading trends for Robinhood, with transaction revenue expected to come in slightly below Q4 estimates.

item.title: Nvidia’s China Orders Are Surging – And Retail Believes Price Targets Will Follow
item.description: According to a Reuters report, Chinese firms have lined up requests for more than 2 million H200 units slated for delivery in 2026, far more than the ...
